mapper.select:
SELECT kenya_lease.*, kenya_user.user_phoneNumber FROM kenya_lease,kenya_user
where kenya_lease.userId = kenya_user.user_id
and kenya_Lease.LeaseName like concat('%',#{LeaseName},'%') or kenya_lease.leaseAddress like concat('%',#{LeaseName},'%')
limit #{start},#{size}

SELECT count(*) FROM kenya_lease
and kenya_Lease.LeaseName like concat('%',#{LeaseName},'%') or kenya_lease.leaseAddress like concat('%',#{LeaseName},'%')
